data.title: SGB Media Online
data.text:
Category: Outdoor

Kohl’s Comps Surge 9.2 Percent in June

Kohl's Corp. said that for the five-week month ended July 2, 2011 total sales increased 9.2 percent and comparable store sales increased 7.5 percent over the five-week month ended July 3, 2010…

Nordstrom’s June Comps Rise 7.9 Percent

Nordstrom, Inc. reported a 7.9 percent increase in same-store sales for the five-week period ended July 2, 2011 compared with the five-week period ended July 3, 2010. Preliminary total retail sales of $927 million for June 2011 increased 12.8 percent comp

Mammut Acquires Snowpulse

Mammut has acquired 100% ownership of Snowpulse, a fellow Swiss company that makes one of Europe's leading air bags for surviving avalanches. Founders and former owners of Snowpulse SA, Yan Berchten, CEO, and Pierre Yves Guernier, CTO, will become em

Sports Direct Buys Fashion Firms

Sports Direct International, the sporting goods chain based in the United Kingdom, has acquired a majority shareholding in fashion brands USC and Cruise Clothing…

IOC Adds Three More Snowsports to 2014 Olympics

The International Olympic Committee's decision Monday to add slopestyle skiing, slopestyle snowboarding and snowboarding parallel slalom to the Olympic Winter Games in 2014 brings to nine the total of new medal events/genders added by the IOC this ye

Respect Your Universe Adds VP of Sales

Respect Your Universe, a mixed martial arts-inspired performance apparel and equipment company, has tapped Kevin Hyland to the position of VP of Sales, effective July 18, 2011…

University of Georgia Licensing New Anti-microbial Technology

A University of Georgia researcher has invented a new technology that can inexpensively render natural and synthetic athletic apparel permanently germ-free. The technology can be applied during the manufacturing process or at home, and it doesn’t co

L.L.Bean Launches Mobile Commerce Site

L.L.Bean debuted its first optimized mobile commerce website. The new L.L.Bean m-commerce site works with smartphones such as the iPhone, Blackberry and Android…

Boxercraft Acquires Assets of Jones and Mitchell

Boxercraft, the maker of spiritwear, has purchased the assets of Jones & Mitchell Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Augusta Sportswear Holdings Inc…

Whole Foods Market to Sell Beyond Coastal

Beyond Coastal, which launched its line of sun care products in the outdoor specialty channel, announced that its full line of will now be available in Whole Foods Market stores throughout the Mid-Atlantic Region…

Teko Socks Moves to Bozeman

Teko Socks is moving its U.S. operations from Boulder, CO to Bozeman, MT as part of a partnership with the Hyalite Outdoor Group…

Sports Distributors of Canada Appoints President

Sports Distributors of Canada Ltd. (SDC) plans to appoint Brad Hause as president, effective Sept. 6, 2011. SDC is a member-owned buying group comprised of over 200 locally owned retail locations operating under the Source For Sports and Source For Advent

Nfinity Athletic Relaunches Website

Nfinity Athletic Corporation re-launched its website, at www.nfinity.com…

UNC, Illinois Among 27 Schools Accused of Violating Anti-trust Laws

A licensing initiative participated in by the University of North Carolina, the University of Illinois and numerous other universities violates federal and state anti-trust laws, according to a several sources, including the dailytarheel.com…
